type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="contains"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ya_fnafmod:</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="text_contains"><value name="text"><block type="item_registry_name"><value name="item"><block items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">- Right click with FAT (Red Mode) to change text!</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_new_line"></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Or alternatively, right click and sneak right click with name tags, and use dye to color!</field></block></value></block></value><value name="position"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
